Description: The Living Planet Index: 1970 to 2018. The bold line shows the index values and the shaded areas represent the statistical certainty surrounding the trend (95%). The index represents 31,821 populations of 5,230 species. All indices are weighted by species richness, giving species-rich taxonomic groups in terrestrial, marine and freshwater systems more weight than groups with fewer species.
